pullRequest.title: Improve confusing names in entities classes.
pullRequest.bodyText:
This pull request aims to solve #954 Entity#isInWater, Entity#isTouchingWater and Entity#isInsideWater are confusing names.
Changes:

Entity#insideWater -> Entity#touchingWater
Entity#inWater -> Entity#submergedInWater
Entity#updateWetState() -> Entity#updateSubmergedInWaterState() for consistency
Entity#isTouchingWater() -> Entity#isWet() to avoid conflict
Entity#isInsideWaterOrRain() -> Entity#isTouchingWaterOrRain() for consistency
Entity#isInsideWater() -> Entity#isTouchingWater()
Entity#isInWater() -> Entity#isSubmergedInWater()
Entity#updateInWater() -> Entity#updateWaterState misleading names as it wasn't only updating the inWater field but other things too, and for consistency
PlayerEntity#isInWater -> PlayerEntity#isSubmergedInWater for consistency
PlayerEntity#updateInWater() -> PlayerEntity#updateSubmergedInWater() for consistency
WolfEntity#wet -> WolfEntity#furWet for consistency
WolfEntity#getWetBrightnessMultiplier() -> WolfEntity#getFurWetBrightnessMultiplier() for consistency
WolfEntity#isWet() -> WolfEntity#isFurWet() to avoid conflict

Javadoc changes:

Added Javadoc for WolfEntity#getFurWetBrightnessMultiplier() as the method is very confusing on what it returns and why.
Added Javadoc for WolfEntity#isFurWet() to avoid confusion with Entity#isWet().
Added Javadoc for Entity#isSubmergedInWater() to avoid confusion.
Added Javadoc for Entity#isTouchingWater() to avoid confusion.
Added Javadoc for Entity#isWet() to avoid confusion.

commit.message: Improve confusing names in entities classes.

nodes.bodyText: The way this is said implies the list is exhaustive. You could use ... or eg. to take into account mods or future updates.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -244,7 +244,12 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1297 net/minecraft/entity/Entity
 	METHOD method_5634 getSoundCategory ()Lnet/minecraft/class_3419;
 	METHOD method_5636 setYaw (F)V
 		ARG 1 yaw
-	METHOD method_5637 isTouchingWater ()Z
+	METHOD method_5637 isWet ()Z
+		COMMENT Returns whether this entity is touching water or is being rained on or is inside a bubble column.

@@ -114,7 +114,7 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1657 net/minecraft/entity/player/PlayerEntity
 	METHOD method_7292 getLuck ()F
 	METHOD method_7293 vanishCursedItems ()V
 	METHOD method_7294 canModifyWorld ()Z
-	METHOD method_7295 updateInWater ()Z
+	METHOD method_7295 updateSubmergedInWater ()Z

commit.message: Small changes following the PR's review.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT Returns whether this entity is touching water or is being rained on or is inside a bubble column, etc...
          
          
            
            		COMMENT Returns whether this entity is touching water, or is being rained on, or is inside a bubble column...
          
      
    
    
  

Note that you would typically use either etc. or ..., but not both at once.

-	METHOD method_5637 isTouchingWater ()Z
